compiler

Class Binary

  • java.lang.Object
    • compiler.Node
      • compiler.Binary

  •  class Binary
extends Node
    Concrete binary operator nodes. Equality for these nodes is defined consistent with common subexpression value. Operators of the same kind with exactly the same operands are equal.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Kinds of binary nodes.
